text: Abby [ ab-ee ] is a well-liked name for infant females that has existed for hundreds of years. It is a truncated version of the name Abigail, which originates from the Hebrew name Avigayil, signifying "my father's joy" or "source of joy." This name has an extensive past and has been used in different cultures and languages. This name was ranked #575 on the US Popular Names in 2021. == People == * Abby Lee Miller, American dance instructor, choreographer, and owner of Reign Dance Productions * Abby Finkenauer, American politician ==References== Category:Names
title: Abby
